channel.title: [317]WorldMap in a Clickable Image[help pls]
channel.description:
[b]Hello, I am trying to make a button in my game which opens the world map. I have everything what i need, except the code which have to make the world map open. can someone help me please? If so, here are some pics from my client.[/b]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2wn1xkg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/10dtz88.png[/img]
Perhaps someone can help me out? I think the link to the WorldMap have to be Client sided, because players have the Worldmap in their client. The button with a red arrow is working, Therefore i used this code [code] if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("World Map")) { launchURL("./worldmap.bat"); }[/code]
[b]how can i make the code work on the image with the earth on it? or what should the code be?[/b]
[size=14pt]info[/size] case: unknown :eek: img: CUSTOM15103 the img was: Lock/Unlock Experience. source&client: 317 if you need more information, Pm me and i'll send, [b]BUT PLEASE HELP!!![/b]
If you want the WorldMap, Pm me :rolleyes:

item.title: [317]WorldMap in a Clickable Image[help pls]
item.dc:creator: @Pascalrs2 Pascalrs2
item.description:
@Pascalrs2 wrote:

Hello,
I am trying to make a button in my game which opens the world map.
I have everything what i need, except the code which have to make the world map open.
can someone help me please?
If so, here are some pics from my client.

2wn1xkg.png641×528

Perhaps someone can help me out?
I think the link to the WorldMap have to be Client sided, because players have the Worldmap in their client.
The button with a red arrow is working, Therefore i used this code

if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("World Map")) { launchURL("./worldmap.bat"); }

how can i make the code work on the image with the earth on it?
or what should the code be?

[size=14pt]info[/size]
case: unknown :eek:
img: CUSTOM15103
the img was: Lock/Unlock Experience.
source&client: 317
if you need more information, Pm me and i’ll send, BUT PLEASE HELP!!!

If you want the WorldMap, Pm me :rolleyes:
